official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of the House report entitled "Street Crime:  Reduction through Positive Criminal Justice Responses".

summary.text: Provides for the printing, for the use of the Select Committee on Crime of the House of Representatives, of thirteen thousand additional copies of the House report "Street Crime: Reduction Through Positive Criminal Justice Responses".

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of the House report entitled "Street Crime:  Reduction through Positive Criminal Justice Responses".
